Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 6 lines text on the recto containing a list of seeds.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (p.295-297, pl.42)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82906) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82906)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 40 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
